trans-unit.source: A trigger action that advances a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"></xref> to the end of its fill period.
trans-unit.target: Действие триггера, который перемещает <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard"> </xref> конец периода заполнения.

trans-unit.source: Use a SkipStoryboardToFill action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to advance a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to its fill period, if it has one.
trans-unit.target: С помощью действия SkipStoryboardToFill с <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>или <xref:System.Windows.Trigger>перемещаться <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>до периода заполнения, если он есть.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Trigger> </xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger>

trans-unit.source: This action also advances all child <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline> objects of the target <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to their fill periods, if they have them.
trans-unit.target: Это действие также перемещает все дочерние <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>объекты целевого <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>для их заполнения периодов, если они существуют.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline>

trans-unit.source: SkipStoryboardToFill only affects an active <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> (after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> starts).

Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> interactively, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Приостановить, возобновить, остановки или раскадровки интерактивно чтобы иметь возможность приостановить, в противном случае элемент управления возобновить или управление <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>в интерактивном режиме, задайте <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>свойство его <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>и использовать <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction>объектов (таких как <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, или <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) управлять им с помощью ссылки на его <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Если <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>из <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>не указан, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A>не может управлять в интерактивном режиме после его начала.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: В разделе [как: управлять раскадровкой после ее запуска](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) для получения дополнительной информации.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.SkipStoryboardToFill"></xref> class.
